review_body: We ordered this calculator for our son's birthday. When it arrived, it was immediately clear that the display was broken as the electronic ink was permanently shown on the display at the right hand side. I returned the calculator without opening the package and requested a replacement.

review_title: Just what I was looking for.
review_body: Why do I need a blue calculator??? Well, other than the fact that I just like to be different, I am seriously tired of my co-workers walking off with my calculator. The plain grey calculators all look alike. This is a big enough calculator that people can't easily hide or deny if I walk up and I can see it...And I can see it from a ways away. There is no denying that this is my calculator.

review_title: Poor quality - only the bottom half of numbers show up!
review_body: Bought 12 of these for my special education classroom. They get used about 30 minutes per day total and I have had them about 2 months now. They worked fine at first, now only the bottom half of numbers show up on the screen - so they are totally unusable. The design is nice, large buttons easily manipulated by children and with large visuals to go by. But the quality just isn't there. I would not recommend.

review_title: OK, but battery is NOT replaceable
review_body: Arrived quickly. Good design, simple and uncluttered for basic tasks with large well marked keys. Since it is also battery powered I was a bit disappointed that the screen wasn't backlit. I needed a battery operated calculator as I often need to use one in fairly low light situations and the solar powered one I have was a pain.  Then looked in the instructions for the battery type that it used, and found out that the battery is NOT replaceable. When the battery dies, you have a solar calculator only. That should have been in the description of the item.

The color is true to the product pic, and the keys work so far (they're a hard plastic), but the positioning of the keys aren't intuitive, if you're accustomed to standard 10-key calculators. Keys 1-9 and the arithmetic operations are fine - these are in a standard location, but who puts the "ON" button on the side middle? I'm constantly pressing the "CE" button instead, which won't turn on the calculator. I'm also used to having the "+/-" , 0, and "." in other placements, but these are minor in comparison to the power button positioning. Basically, the layout forces you to look and find what you need, rather than typing away.

review_title: Buy a Texas Instuments calculator instead
review_body: I've used lots of calculators throughout my life and I've got to say that this calculator is by far the worst calculator I have ever used!!!  Two main reasons: 1.  the calculator doesn't calculate percentage like other calculators.  Meaning on a regular calculator if you input a number and push the percent sign the calculator would convert that number to a decimal.  And if you used the percent to calculate the percentage of tax for example the calculator would usually give you the percentage amount then the total.  2.  There is no OFF button.  It takes 10-12 minutes to automatically shut off.  I know its dual powered but its such a waste of power and I like to make sure I shut my things off.

Cheap junk!  I chose this calculator because I really liked the color & overall look. I just needed a basic 10-key style calculator.  The size is fine, but the buttons are horrible!  It's so frustrating to use that I finally threw it away, and I really hate to waste things like that!  Even when you're trying to hit the keys carefully (as opposed to quickly by touch), it's still really hard to get the keys to work consistently.  They stick a lot or just don't make contact.  It's also very light and slides easily while you try use it.  You need one hand to hold it and one to type (and re-type and clear and re-type again).

review_title: neat colors, but quality not equal to Sharp, Casio, or Canon
review_body: I bought this Avalon calculator for its large size, its shape (I like that the display is angled upward a little), and for the selection of fun colors. I chose green. It's solar-powered but also comes with a battery for use in darker environments. Love the jumbo display, buttons, and the huge 'equals' button - the one button you use all the time.

This pink calculator is cute and functions ok, but it's slightly frustrating to use because you have to push so hard on the buttons to make them work. I've messed up my calculations many times because I'm going too fast and realize that a number didn't register. You have to push really hard and go slow. It's ok for simple calculations and is easier than getting my iPhone calculator out each time but it's very low quality. You get what you pay for.

I bought this calculator after I spilled coffee over the one I always have on my home office desk.  I needed a basic calculator - no fancy bells or whistles, just reliable, easy to read calculations.  I've been using it daily for over a week and find nothing to complain about:  operates on dual power (solar/battery) so is bright and clear even when stored in a drawer for a while; easy to read display,  large number/function keys that are easy to locate and read, very reasonable price,  - the cute color doesn't hurt either.

My original receipt arrived not working correctly.  The screen didn't fully display all the digits.  The vendor replaced the item quickly.  Nice to do business with a vendor that stands by its products.  I purchased this for my 6 year old who is interested in math.  Since green is his favorite color, I thought this would be a hit.  The buttons and display are large. Which makes it easy to use for a beginner.  Basic calculator that meets my son's basic needs. It's not heavy and the rubber feet keep the calculator from sliding around.

When I had to replace my calculator, I was looking for something colorful for my desk at work and this little calculator caught my eye. I love the big numbers and function keys. They're easy to see and it's small in size so doesn't take up a huge space on my desk. One thing that bothers me is the overhead flourescent lighting makes the display difficult to see as there's a reflection problem, but it seems to be the same with whatever calculator I've used so that's not a problem as I just angle it so the lights don't shine directly on the display. The battery is not replaceable but since it's also solar powered, that's not a huge problem, but it really should have been addressed in the original product description. I love this colorful little calculator that adds a touch of pizzaz to my desk.

The calculator that I received was defective.  The Error code was present from the beginning and would not clear.  The unit would not perform any calculations other than addition.  Thinking that it just needed more power, I then tried to let it get some solar power for a day or so--but that failed to resolve the issue.

review_title: Display malfunctioned after less than a year of use
review_body: Worked well for a while, but after several months the display began to malfunction, showing malformed numbers (segments gray or unlit instead of black). Maybe the battery needs replacement, but in bright light the "solar" panel should provide enough power even with no battery power; mine doesn't. Otherwise, no complaints, except maybe that it is very lightweight and doesn't always stay put in use.

review_title: Not Recommended for One-Handed Office/School Work
review_body: As for functionality, calculations work as they should, however it has a few quirks that make it unsuitable for my needs.

review_title: Calculator wobbles/flips up when you tap the + sign
review_body: The calculator works fine but the rubber feet on back that keep it in place do not do their job. The + button is SO far over to the side, when you punch in the + the whole calculator wobbles/flips up even with a normal tap. It's the most annoying thing, I can't even use it for one garage sale I bought it for. It's a shame because otherwise it's fine. Definite return.

review_title: I liked how big the screen was and the size of ...
review_body: The screen on the first one that I bought cracked so badly that I couldn't use it. I liked how big the screen was and the size of the buttons, so I purchased the same calculator a second time. This one does not have a cracked screen, but it does not work :( I have to press down really, really hard on the buttons, and it does not compute. I liked the look of this calculator, but I ended up getting a Casio standard function calculator. My grade depends somewhat on the functioning of the calculator. The one I received is not working.

review_title: Probably my most used and favorite calculator.
review_body: Probably my most used and favorite calculator.  Large Digit Display and Bright too, some other calculators are not bright enough especially with solar powered.  Buttons are also bigger to maximize the space.  And, the 8 digit display gives you more calculating power.  Highly Recommended!!

review_title: Bright Pink Calculators are easy to Find in the Dark
review_body: Not a bad little calculator.

review_title: Office Style 8 Digit Dual Powered Desktop Calculator
review_body: The Calculator I received right out of the package DIDN'T WORK... I followed the directions on how to charge it up, but it never did work... I feel that if your buying something new it should work... I would have replaced the battery, but the directions said not to because it could damage it. I guess you get what you pay for...

You have to hit the buttons dead center and hard to actually key in the number the first time.  I miss numbers if I don't snack the keys hard enough so this means you can't punch numbers in quickly or accurately.
This is not bad for the price. I am not giving the 5th star for 2 main reasons:

review_title: Only four of six worked out of the box
review_body: Read reviews that said some arrived not working but took a chance.  I teach special needs kids who need the big buttons.  Well, one of the six did not work at all and another only sort of works (the "CE" button doesn't work).  So, if you're willing to pay for six and get four, this is the deal for you.  Apparently, quality control is not a hallmark of Avalon.

review_title: All the features I want and none of the features I don't want!
review_body: Love this! Perfect for my 12 year old who needed a calculator for math work, but without all the distracting bells and whistles. Big easy to see buttons and numbers on the screen. The big plus is that this works off of a battery when the solar panel is not working when you are working in lower light. When it arrived the screen was damaged and they quickly sent out a replacement.

review_title: These worked great for my students
review_body: These worked great for my students.  They are super simple with only the functions needed for elementary school (1-6) math. The big buttons are great for little hands and for students who have difficulty with fine motor skills (OT issues).  My students especially liked them because of the bright color, saying they "look like they're fun to use!"  The visual was highly motivating.  Students always choose to use these over the regular black/grey/silver ones I already had.  I would definitely buy these again.
Unfortunately I didn't check out this calculator soon enough and then it was too late to return it.  My bad.

review_title: Not Dependable in a Time Crunch!
review_body: This calculator sometimes shows a "0" after typing in several numbers and an action (multiply, divide, etc).  The numbers will come up as I type them but somewhere in the process, it is being erased from memory.  Maybe I'm hitting the keys too quickly, too much pressure, not enough pressure - I don't know why.  After using this thing for about 15 minutes I have tossed the two I purchased in the trash.  Sometimes it works fine and other times it doesn't.  I ordered two of these to use when taking a timed test for my real estate license and I absolutely cannot afford the inconvenience of having to re-input calculations.  I give it 2 stars because it should be fine if you have the time and patience to deal with the issue I described.

review_title: This calculator has never worked. There is just a ...
review_body: This calculator has never worked.  There is just a scramble of incomplete numbers, impossible to read.  I have placed this calculator in direct sunlight, (for only a few minutes) or under an indoor lamp, and even waited 24 hours, it never works.

I received this yesterday, it works just fine. The only problem I have is it was shipped with no fillers inside the box so the calculator was bouncing around and came out of its original packaging. No idea how much damage was actually done but since it works there's no reason to return.

review_title: It's big and pink lol it almost looks like a kid toy
review_body: Idk what I was thinking lol it's big ok . It's big and pink lol it almost looks like a kid toy . It works though but I think it's for kids. I'll be giving it to a little cousin . Cute but not suitable for adults (humble opinion ) .

Haven't had time to make a whole lot of use of this item yet, but here is my initial quick and dirty --- good product...  display is good and dark, easy to read.  Calculator is large enough to sit still when being used, but small enough to tuck away nicely when not in use. Buttons are reasonably large and easy to use without fat-fingering.  My only negative is the battery is not replaceable.  I know, it is solar powered, but that assumes you will always be working in a fairly well lit environment... Not always the case.

review_title: she loved it, she got so upset that it died
review_body: After 2 years of use, it died.  Can't figure it out how to change battery.  I bought this for a friend, the pink one, she loved it, she got so upset that it died!

review_title: Item arrived with a scratch on the screen, within ...
review_body: Item arrived with a scratch on the screen, within its sealed package.  Since the package itself was not damaged in any way, it must have been packaged with the scratch while still at the factory.  The calculator appears to work, so 2 stars for that.  Amazon will give me a refund if I re-order, so when an undamaged calculator arrives, I will likely upgrade this this review.

review_title: What a great calculator for a person with low vision
review_body: What a great calculator for a person with low vision.  The design is well thought out and it has the look, feel and function of a high quality calculator. The display is super easy to read and the keys are large, well laid out, and work very smoothly.  Kudos to Avalon Electronics for putting the effort into designing a product that was actually made to last in what has become a throw away society.I highly recommend this product.  If fact, I plan to order a second one!

review_title: that seems like too long and too much battery usage before it ...
review_body: Item is as described and seems to work well.  The only thing I don't care for is that there is no off button and that instructions say it will go off automatically after 11 minutes.  Since this is only for home use, that seems like too long and too much battery usage before it shuts off.  A button to handle it yourself would have been nice.
From day one, these calculators would not work, except near a window, and not after it started to get dark outside. My kids need to be able to work at their desk, so we sent them back.

review_title: This has been a great calculator for me
review_body: This has been a great calculator for me. I need to use a calculator at work daily and this one  is easy to use, the number keys stick out slightly so they are easy to hit and hard to miss. I've had calculators in the past where you have to make sure to hit certain number keys exactly the right way and this calculator is not like that!  It's also big enough that it's easy to read but small enough that it's not in the way.

review_title: Great calculators at a reasonable price.
review_body: This past order of the Avalon calculators makes over 2 dozen that I have ordered. That is not because they don't hold up to everyday use, but quite the opposite!! These calculators stand up well in everyday use. This is  the best calculator that I have found (and I have tried many) for my application... in the cabs of my fleet of over 70 trucks in the plumbing & heating and fuel delivery business. The large buttons, large displays, dual power are what my guys like about these Avalon calculators. I like that I have found something that stands up in daily use. I also like the dual power and the bright colors.  The only Avalon calculators that have failed on the job were due to being crushed or smashed.  If you are looking for a great, yet inexpensive calculator, this is my recommendation.

Basic simple calculator.  Works great for my pluses, minuses & goes-into's. Big keys are easy to see and aren't crowded together.. Love the color. Have no problem finding it among my cluttered desk. It's the "jitterbug" of calculators.
Came to me damaged and unusable.  Missed the deadline for returning, so I own a worthless calculator. Find another brand, or you'll also be out $8.00.
This calculator replaces two that I was using previously.

Bought this for my almost-5-year-old for Christmas and he absolutely loves it.  It's his favorite toy.  He loves being able to add up numbers!  Great product and great price!  And it's been thrown around with three toddlers in the house and is still working just fine.

I ordered this calculator for my wife, giving her bigger keys and a larger view screen than my Casio Sl-300VC.  This Avalon calculator works just fine but I find it is clunky compared to the Casio, which is similarly priced.  Unless you need the large keyboard, I think the Casio is preferable.  They both do the same practical job.

review_title: Tips easy if you push the buttons too hard
review_body: I didn't really need a calculator but I couldn't resist the purple one!  The numbers on the buttons and the display are clear and easy to read and it seems to work pretty well in fairly dim light. The only issue I have is that the edges are kind of rounded so if you push the buttons on the side too hard (for instance the plus sign) it tips easily.  It doesn't tip over, just to the side you are pushing (like a see-saw.) The calculator this replaced was squarer and didn't tip.
Perfect size, large clear display, large contrasting buttons, great viewing angle, lightweight and cool looking. Just what I was looking for. Great price too !

review_title: I LOVE MY WONDERFUL PERFECT CALCULATOR!!!
review_body: I FINALLY FOUND MY PERFECT CALCULATOR, THIS GREEN IS SO VIVID, THIS CALCULATOR HAS EASY BUTTONS, FUN LOOKING, YET, DEPENDABLE, AND THE PRICE IS FAIR. I'M VERY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE, THANK YOU FOR THIS WONDERFUL CUTE CALCULATOR!!! I LOVE IT SO MUCH !!! 5 STARS!!!

review_title: Colorful Calculator for a Beginner to Experience Adding and Subtracting.
review_body: Our four year old granddaughter  the color  PINK.  She is just learning how to add/subtract, so this calculator is a perfect tool.

DO NOT BUY THIS, it's cute and a good size, but after only using it a few times it didn't work, the screen would light up weird. Couldn't even read any numbers. I emailed customer service and they did not get back to me.

review_title: Great price and works well under normal indoor lighting
review_body: Great price and works well under normal indoor lighting. The calculator is great for grade school kids learning how to use a calculator.

The arrangements of the buttons takes some getting used to - the = on all other calculators I've used is on the right so muscle memory leads me to the wrong buttons!  Works perfectly so far and the neon color makes them much easier to find on a messy counter or desk!
Works fine but the body is warped slightly so it doesn't sit flat on a table. It rocks to the side a little with every entry which is distracting.

love, love, love my new purple desktop calculator.  I was after the color but was delighted that the calculator itself has a nice soft touch for the keys and is very responsive. Glad I had gone ahead and purchased two.
It's not up to the Amazon Basic which I love, as it has no "off" switch.  But it's handy for quick calculations and I'd buy it again.

review_title: Calculator is nice and large and the color is amazing (I got ...
review_body: Calculator is nice and large and the color is amazing (I got green and it looks exactly like the picture). Only reason I give four stars is because it is difficult to see the numbers unless you have the calculator right under your nose. Not a deal breaker, but it makes it a bit difficult to use on a desk. I still love it though and will continue to use it!
You pay for what you get.  The buttons stick.  When the battery dies after 3 months, you can't replace it.  I did just need a cheap calculator, but was actually surprised at just how cheap this was.

I wanted to update my office supplies, as the ones bought by the person previously holding my position at my job had very outdated supplies. I love the colors of this calculator, so I was immediately drawn to it. The buttons are a decent size, and it's not big or bulky. However, it freezes up about every other time I use it. Luckily, my computer has a calculator. But this really deters me from using this calculator over the one on my computer/phone.

review_title: It's a crappy calculator. Does basic calculations (addition
review_body: It's a crappy calculator. Does basic calculations (addition, subtraction, division and multiplication) but that's about it. While it does get the job done, buttons rattle and the body of the calculator feels cheap in general. I bought this to use during tests that don't allow graphing calculator, will probably give it away after I'm done with it.
I bought this to use for my FAA Written test.  Very basic and did what I needed.  and the price was good.

review_title: The button sizes on these are great. However I wish the display was tilted a ...
review_body: The button sizes on these are great. However I wish the display was tilted a little more upright. You have to be directly in front and above it to see. I use a calculator frequenty to the side of my desk and at most angles, I cannot see the screen.
Numbers and buttons are large so thats a plus.  It is made out of a light weight plastic so feels cheap  I have only had it a short time so i hope it last.

The 0 key started sticking day 1. I use my calculator every day so swamped this one into another area in our business that gets less use. Was really hoping to make this my everyday calculator since the bright blue color would have been easy to track down if it got borrowed off my desk.
This calculate is good. It is a decent size so it won't get lost. It has clear directions in the instruction paper. It works well and is exactly what I needed.

review_title: Taking A Chance With Used Warehouse Deals
review_body: My review is based on a purchase from the "Used" / "Warehouse" option.

review_title: Green, Green Avalon does the trick for me!
review_body: I liked everything about it including the color which I ordered specifically because I use it for my budget computations and it is a very bright and cheerful green.  The only thing I would like to see on it would be an "off" key.  I know it goes off automatically if not used but I just like an off button.  I guess that is just me.
I like the large buttons. Though it is silly I like the color. It's got a cheerful look. The only drawback (minor) is when you hit the plus sign it tips a little.

Curved bottom makes it impossible to hit buttons without the calculator lifting and moving on table. The buttons only allow one press at at time and have a delay, so if you try to cleanly hit two buttons quickly you will miss a number, you have to go very slow. Between needing two hands to hold it steady and the terrible buttons always skipping numbers this is a completely unusable calculator.
IT IS GREAT AS FAR AS COLOR AND LARGE KEYS BUT IT WON'T TURN ON AND WORKS ONLY IF I HOLD IT UNDER THE LIGHT OR IN THE WINDOW...JUST NOT WORKING RIGHT...WILL SEND IT BACK!!

review_title: Very disappointed. Guess I should've returned it
review_body: The LED is so faded. I couldn't it. Very disappointed.  Guess I should've returned it, but I through away the package and put the calculator on my desk, a few days later , I used it for the first time and found out it was so faded you couldn't read the numbers on the LED.

super cute, huge buttons! really easy to use, I need a desk calculator for my home office, I loved this pink calc and it's a really nice size; slightly larger than the last desk calc I had but not so big it's like an adding machine! I love the solar power, if the battery goes eventually I can still use this, a perfect paring with my other pink office accessories!
I use this at work and at home. Love the big keys. And, it's pink!

review_title: It would be perfect for anyone with vision impairment
review_body: It does what a calculator is supposed to do.  The buttons are very large and a bit spread out.  It would be perfect for anyone with vision impairment.  I just use it to do quick math, so it works for me.  Note that is doesn't have tax buttons.
It works, I can find it because of the bright color.  I bought two, one pink and the other purple.  Would buy again.
Great for the price.  I'm a middle school teacher and I ordered a class set of these calculators.  They have been very sturdy as they are dropped very often.  The big buttons are easy to use too.

review_title: I am very happy with this calculator.
review_body: I love pink and this calculator is large and I can see it well . I need large print to be able to see the numbers on the calculator , and this works great for me.
I hardly used this and then destroyed a $120 roast by over cooking due to the thermometer saying the roast was a lower temperature than it actually was. Bummer

This calculator is pretty, but you can hardly see the numbers when you sit it flat on a table.  If you angle it, it's fine.  But I need it to work flat.  Not thrilled with this at all. Disappointing purchase!
I does the basic calcs my wife and I need to do.

review_title: Fun to use and love the big buttons.
review_body: I ordered this calculator because I need the big buttons for a lot of fast calculations. It didn't disappoint. It's great to look at and I make fewer errors because of the big buttons.
I got this for the color which is accurate, but the buttons are hard to push and seem cheap. Good for the price but I wish I didn't have to push the buttons so hard.

review_title: This is great for quick uses
review_body: This is just what I wanted - a small, simple calculator that has keys big enough for fingers to feel.  This is great for quick uses, but especially helpful if I have longer columns of numbers to add quickly.  By the size of its keys I can add without having to watch my fingers hit the numbers.

review_title: Nice price and color selection was to keep it from ...
review_body: Nice price and color selection was to keep it from getting stolen off my desk.  It does the job, but the button push feels bulky and must be deliberate if that makes sense.  The button push just does not feel as natural as other units.  However it will get the job done.
The buttons are loose on this calculater. I had hoped for a better quality for the cost.

Very pleased with this purchase. We were looking for a calculator with larger buttons for ease of use. These are exactly what we needed and so far are performing perfectly. We use them for our dart league players in our retirement community, and everyone is so happy with them. The price was very attractive which made the purchase even better. When you can get what you want for a price that you like, then I guess you can not ask for anything more.
These are excellent for elementary-middle school children!  The numbers are large and there isn't much "fuss" to the usage of this product.  My students (4th-6th graders) love these!

review_title: Avalon 8 Digit Dual Powered Desktop Calculator
review_body: Just what I was looking for. No bells and whistles or other fancy features, which I didn't need. Bought two of these in different colors. One for my vehicle and one for my office. Perfectly fits my needs. Both work great, no sticky keys or other misfires! Love it.
Great color, solidly manufactured, and works perfectly!
I like the color, big buttons and big screen. Works well for a simple calculator.

review_title: Super cheap. One came not working and two stopped ...
review_body: Super cheap.  One came not working and two stopped within 1 week.  I emailed the seller and have hear nothing back.  the ones that still work do their job but you can tell that these will not hold up.

My little 4 yr old boy loves this calculator. He sleeps with it under his pillow. :) great for small children who are learning the fundamentals of calculator use. Also totally functional for adults. I love the size! I grab it for calculations here and there. Beautiful bright green color.

I'm VERY happy with this calculator.  It's big but still fits in my hand. The keys are easy to push and the display is very easy to read.  It's everything I wanted in a new calculator. It's made well, It doesn't look like it's cheap or junky.

It's an okay calculator. Cheap, lightweight. Chinese made. Much bigger than I thought it would be. Large keys & ample display but no memory.  Moves around on the desk a lot when punching in numbers in spite of the rubber feet.. Did I say cheap?

This is exactly what I was looking for.  A simple calculator, with big numbers, works without the need for light.  I especially like the fact that the back of the calculator is bent forward so that the numbers on the screen are easily read.  Love the pink!
This calculator is cute and functional I love it

review_title: Simple calculator! Just what I needed!
review_body: Can’t go wrong with this calculator!
Battery was DOA and the solar cell is not powerful enough to run the calculator in normal indoor lighting conditions unless you're directly under a focused lamp.

review_title: I'm so glad my calculator bit the dust
review_body: I'm so glad my calculator bit the dust, it was so hard to use, and this one is a dream!  I love it!  The buttons are nice and big and so is the screen to see your totals!  It's still not to big to be on my desk, and it's bright color makes it easy to spot.
Works as expected.  it does not say 1+1 =3
The product is fine but the long delivery time is lousy.

review_title: This calculator was defective – the display doesn't show the ...
review_body: This calculator was defective – the display doesn't show the full number (e.g. the "3" is missing the bottom stem, the "2" is half missing) so it was impossible to discern what it was showing. Also, the quality is really lacking - the plastic is cheap.
Large, clumsy, awkward, cheap piece of plastic with keys that stick. Nuf said.
This is an excellent desk calculator. I use it everyday at work. The buttons feel nice and are easy to press. This calculator makes crunching numbers fun!
Nice looking basic calculator. I like it except the operating keyboard must be pressed harder than any calculator I've owned. Other than that, it's a good looking device.

review_title: Bought as a Gift for a Child
review_body: My granddaughter is always taking my daughter's calculator to play with. She calls it her typer. So, I got her one of her own. She loves it.

review_title: Worked great for a couple months but now there is an ...
review_body: Worked great for a couple months but now there is an E on the screen that doesn't clear and the numbers do not fully display. Thought I needed to change a battery but after trying to find instructions online and reading other reviews I see that its not possible. Next calculator I will invest more money for something that will last longer. I am not normally one to write negative reviews, but I was extremely disappointed in this product.

review_title: I love this little calculator especially because it is green
review_body: I love this little calculator especially because it is green.  I can easily find it among the clutter  on my desk.

review_title: The whole reason I bought this is because it was ...
review_body: The whole reason I bought this is because it was dual powered. However the battery was dead upon delivery. You can't change the battery in it either. I needed one that runs off a battery because my work area isn't well lite.
Most pocket calculated I have seen only work on solar power and this one I believe works on batter also so I use it at the grocery store

It's a great calculator.  The large keys keep me from missing or hitting more than one number or action.  I do wish the screen tilt was more angled, but it is better than my last flat calculator.  Pink is one of my favorite colors.
Got this as a gift. It's bigger than I expected the font and buttons are pretty large. But that may come in handy if you like/need that sort of thing.

review_title: Here are a few reasons we are pleased with the purchase
review_body: My wife and I are thrilled with this basic calculator.  Here are a few reasons we are pleased with the purchase: dual powered means we don't have to be in bright light to operate it, the buttons are large and simple to use, the screen is slightly raised for easy reading, and the green color makes it a cinch to find in a drawer/cabinet.
Simple, straightforward calculator.  Good choice.

review_title: and bottom of the calculator look like it has been used before
review_body: Interesting... It's brand new out of the package, however the face, top, and bottom of the calculator look like it has been used before. There are many abrasions and minor scratches everywhere. It's definitely a used calculator placed into new packaging. I'm also in agreement with another reviewer who states that the feet of the unit are not on the outside edges therefore causing the calculator to rock when you push certain buttons on the sides. Not sure if I'm going to send it back or not yet... See images, bear in mind this is exactly how it looked in my hands not more than two minutes out of the packaging.

I love this calculator! The first thing I noticed was as soon as I opened it and pressed the "on" button it worked immediately. This is powered by a "button cell" battery, but it is also solar powered! I love this feature because even after the battery dies you can still use it. Just expose it to bright light. The number keys are pretty big, so no worries about pushing the wrong button. I have used this for a few days now, and it works absolutely fine. It also comes in several different colors, including black. I got the purple, which I happen to love. It has a slightly tilted display, so it is very easy to read. This calculator from Avalon would be perfect for home or office. I use mine at home to balance my checkbook. Works great! **I received this product at a discount for an honest and unbiased review. All opinions expressed are my own.**

review_title: The Avalon is an excellent basic calculator for those who like oversized number and function keys ...
review_body: Probably the most noticeable feature about these particular calculators are the oversized number and function keys.  I don't know how many times I've tried working with a smaller calculator, only to have to go back an redo my calculations.  Larger keys are a real plus because there's less chance I'll be accidentally hitting another one.  I'm not exactly from the generation of people who works with smaller keys / keyboards, so I definitely appreciate this fact.

I love this purple calculator. The color is so bright and vibrant! The numbers are also very big and can be seen and read easily. I really like the fact that this calculator has a percentage key, as this is the key that I use most often in my retail business. The screen is already tilted upward helping to avoid glares from the sun. What a Great product! I am so happy to have had the opportunity to buy this item at a discount in exchange for my unbiased and honest review. Thanks A lot!

review_title: The feet (support pads) are too close together
review_body: It is a vibrant color and works very well. The only con I have is the feet (support pads) are too close together and it rocks when you push a button on either side, which is often. The odds are that the other colors are built the same way. I fixed it by putting stick-on pads to the outside of the body on the back, which is something one should NOT have to do. This product was provided at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

review_title: I love everything about this calculator
review_body: I love everything about this calculator.  I love purple, so it's color is beautiful to me!  It's nice and big, easy to push the buttons.  I like the fact that it's solar powered. I do wish that it had an off button, but a lot of calculators do not.  It is well built and sturdy.  It feels like it would last a long time.  I would recommend this calculator to anyone.

I liked the color purple. The size is perfect in that it is not too small to lose nor too big for a purse or on a desk. The numbers are a nice size easy to touch. The screen is easy to see the numbers. This calculator is powered by a solar panel and a battery. I like the feature of the dual power source. My 8 year old grandson could use it and my 82 year old mom also with ease. I received this calculator at a discount price for a honest review.
